Authors:
Vera F. Malysheva, Viacheslav Spirin, Nathan Schoutteten,
Ruben De Lange, Jorma Pennanen, Karl-Henrik Larsson
Title:
New and noteworthy species of Helicogloea
(Atractiellomycetes, Basidiomycota) in Europe
Abstract:
Two new species of Helicogloea, H. aseptata and H.
insularis, are described based on collections from North Europe. In
addition, morphological and host flexibility of H. dryina, H. sebacea
and H. subardosiaca is discussed, and a key for teleomorphic Helicogloea
spp. found in Europe is provided.
